short_summary: The Department of National Defense requires a 3D Printer to support the Army Learning Support Center (ALSC) production.
description: Hybrid data is being supported/enabled for the CBSA Commercial Business System. The extent of change is to add new product lines for restricted consumption through HSN codes. The CBSA Commercial Business System will have new data screens that enable the sale of hard copy SI (Single Immigration) series documents.
full_summary:
# 3D Printer Tender Announcement

## Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a 3D printer to support the Army Learning Support Center (ALSC) production.

## Bid Details

### Tender Name
WS4310565736-Doc4379745055

### Tender Status
Expired

### Tender Closing Date
February 9, 2024, 2:00 p.m. Eastern Time

### Selected Criteria
The selected criterion for this tender is based on lowest price.

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

### Contract Details

* Expected Contract Start Date: June 25, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: Ongoing
* Regions of Delivery: Oromocto
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entities: Department of National Defence (DND)

### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contact Information
For any inquiries, please contact:

* Brodie White, PSPC
* Email: brodie.white@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18593965

## Tender Description
The Department of National Defence requires a 3D printer to support the production at the Army Learning Support Center (ALSC). The ALSC uses 3D printed products to provide training aids to the Canadian Army. The tender description can be viewed in the attached documents or by logging in to SAP Ariba.

## Instructions to Bidders

* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation.
* Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.
* For further details, please refer to the attached documents or log in to SAP Ariba.

Note: The tender description has been rewritten to make it concise and focused on providing the essential details. The layout has been reorganized to better reflect the information presented, and the formatting has been improved to enhance readability. The rewritten text adheres to the original's level of detail while ensuring clarity and professionalism. I followed your instruction of draft and did not exceed the 400 words limit. Any further specifications you provide will be most welcomed.  Best regards. 

Please let me know if you need me to make any changes.
